title: A theory for combinations of risk measures. (arXiv:1807.01977v7 [q-fin.MF] UPDATED)
abstract: We study combinations of risk measures under no restrictive assumption on the set of alternatives. We develop and discuss results regarding the preservation of properties and acceptance sets for the combinations of risk measures. One of the main results is the representation of resulting risk measures from the properties of both alternative functionals and combination functions. We build on developing a dual representation for an arbitrary mixture of convex risk measures. In this case, we obtain a penalty that recalls the notion of inf-convolution under theoretical measure integration. We develop results related to this specific context. We also explore features of individual interest generated by our frameworks, such as the preservation of continuity properties and the representation of worst-case risk measures.

translated_title: 风险度量组合的理论研究
translated_abstract: 我们研究了在替代方案集合上没有限制条件的风险度量组合。我们开发并讨论了有关组合风险度量的属性和接受集的保留结果。主要结果之一是从备选函数和组合函数的属性中表示出所得到的风险度量。我们在发展任意凸风险度量的双重表示的基础上进行构建。在这种情况下，我们得到一个惩罚，可以回忆理论度量集成下的 inf-convolution 的概念。我们对这种特定情况开发了相关结果。我们还探索了由我们的框架生成的个人利益的特点，如连续性属性的保留和最坏情况风险度量的表示。
tldr: 该论文研究了无限制条件下的风险度量组合，并提出了备选函数和组合函数属性的表示方法，以及任意凸风险度量的双重表示方法，同时探索了连续性属性的保留和最坏情况风险度量的表示。
en_tdlr: This paper studies combinations of risk measures without restrictive assumptions on the set of alternatives, proposes a representation method based on the properties of alternative functionals and combination functions, and develops a dual representation for an arbitrary mixture of convex risk measures. The paper also explores the preservation of continuity properties and the representation of worst-case risk measures.
